mapper.select:
SELECT goodsNum, amountMoney, primeMoney, additionalCost, additionalPrice, additionalCount, storeDescribe, storeUnit, storeCount, saleNum, isSale, payMoney, departNumber, companyId, settleDate, saleName, saleNumber, type from ( SELECT ss.`goods_num` as goodsNum, ss.`amount_money` as amountMoney, ss.`prime_money` as primeMoney, ss.`additional_cost` as additionalCost, ss.`additional_price` as additionalPrice, ss.`additional_count` as additionalCount, ss.`store_describe` as storeDescribe, ss.`store_unit` as storeUnit, ss.`store_count` as storeCount, su.`username` AS saleNum, c.is_sale AS isSale, s.`pay_money` AS payMoney, d.depart_number as departNumber, d.company_id as companyId, s.settle_date as settleDate, s.sale_name as saleName, s.sale_number as saleNumber, c.type FROM store_sales ss JOIN settlement s ON s.sale_number = ss.sale_number JOIN department d ON d.depart_number = ss.store_num JOIN sys_user su ON su. NAME = s.sale_name join cost c on c.sale_number = s.sale_number union SELECT '' as goodsNum, '' as amountMoney, '' as primeMoney, '' as additionalCost, '' as additionalPrice, '' as additionalCount, '' as storeDescribe, '' as storeUnit, '' as storeCount, su.`username` AS saleNum, c.is_sale AS isSale, s.`pay_money` AS payMoney, m.depart_number as departNumber, d.company_id as companyId, s.settle_date as settleDate, s.sale_name as saleName, s.sale_number as saleNumber, c.type from cost c JOIN settlement s ON s.sale_number = c.sale_number join member m on m.card_number = s.member_number JOIN sys_user su ON su. NAME = s.sale_name join department d on d.depart_number = m.depart_number) a
and departNumber = #{departNumber} and companyId in (#{companyid}) and saleNum = #{saleNum} and date_format(settleDate ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #{settleDateStart} and date_format(settleDate ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{settleDateEnd} and (`type`='配镜单' or `type`='定金单' OR `type` = '检查单') and isSale != 0
GROUP BY saleNumber

select count(*) from store_sales ss join settlement s on s.sale_number = ss.sale_number join department d on d.depart_number = ss.store_num join sys_user su on su.name = ss.sale_name
and d.depart_number = #{departNumber} and d.company_id in (#{companyid}) and date_format(s.settle_date ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) = (#{settleDate})

select count(sale_number) as checkCount ,SUM(cost_money) as checkMoney,is_sale as isSale from cost
sale_number = #{saleNumber} and `type`='检查单' and is_sale != 0
group by sale_number

select s.`id`,s.`ptometry_number`,s.`member_number`,m.`name` as memberName,m.`sex`,m.`age`,m.`phone_1` as phone1,s.`sale_name`,s.`sale_number`,s.`goods_num`,s.`goods_code`,s.`eye_type`,s.`amount_money`,s.`prime_money`,s.`mirror_way`,s.`mirror_time`, s.`miror_address`,s.`store_num`,s.`urgent_status`,s.`goods_rebate`,s.`fixed_price`,s.`moling_money`,s.`additional_cost`,s.`process_ask`, s.`store_name`,s.`store_describe`,s.`store_unit`,s.`store_count`,s.`remark`,s.`saleremark`,s.`give_name`,s.`peijing_time`,s.`optometry_name`,s.`out_recipel`,s.jj_goods_name, s.`recipel_type`,s.`optometrywl_name`,s.`recipelwl_type`,s.`taocan_name`,s.`classtype`,s.`additional_price`,s.`additional_count`,s.`unit`,s.`batch`,s.`left_right`,s.`righttg`,s.`lefttg` from store_sales s join settlement st on st.sale_number = s.sale_number join member m on m.card_number = s.member_number join department d on d.company_id = m.company_id
and date_format(st.settle_date ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= (#{settleDateStart}) and date_format(st.settle_date ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <= (#{settleDateEnd}) and m.state = #{state} and m.company_id in (#{companyid}) and s.store_num = #{departNumber} and s.sale_type = '1'
GROUP BY s.sale_number

select s.`sale_name`,s.`sale_acount` from settlement s join store_sales ss on ss.sale_number = s.sale_number join member m on m.card_number = s.member_number
and m.company_id in (#{companyid}) and date_format(s.settle_date ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= (#{settleDateStart}) and date_format(s.settle_date ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <= (#{settleDateEnd}) and m.state = #{state} and ss.store_num = #{departNumber} and (ss.sale_type = '1')
GROUP BY s.sale_name

select s.`id`,s.`ptometry_number`,s.`member_number`,m.`name` as memberName,m.`sex`,m.`age`,m.`phone_1` as phone1,s.`sale_account`,s.`sale_number`,s.`goods_num`,s.`goods_code`,s.`eye_type`,s.`amount_money`,s.`prime_money`,s.`mirror_way`,s.`mirror_time`, s.`miror_address`,s.`store_num`,s.`urgent_status`,s.`goods_rebate`,s.`fixed_price`,s.`moling_money`,s.`additional_cost`,s.`process_ask`, s.`store_name`,s.`store_describe`,s.`store_unit`,s.`store_count`,s.`remark`,s.`saleremark`,s.`give_name`,s.`peijing_time`,s.`optometry_name`,s.`out_recipel`,s.jj_goods_name,st.`sale_name`,st.`sale_acount` as saleAccount, s.`recipel_type`,s.`optometrywl_name`,s.`recipelwl_type`,s.`taocan_name`,s.`classtype`,s.`additional_price`,s.`additional_count`,s.`unit`,s.`batch`,s.`left_right`,s.`righttg`,s.`lefttg`, st.`change_money`,st.`model_money`,s.sale_type from store_sales s join settlement st on st.sale_number = s.sale_number join member m on m.card_number = s.member_number join department d on d.company_id = m.company_id
and m.company_id in (#{companyid}) and date_format(st.settle_date ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= (#{settleDateStart}) and date_format(st.settle_date ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <= (#{settleDateEnd}) and m.state = #{state} and s.store_num = #{departNumber} and (s.sale_type = '1')
GROUP BY s.sale_number

select u.store,u.username,u.name from sys_user u join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id=ur.user_id
and u.company_id in (#{companyId}) and u.store = #{department} and (ur.role_id = 7)
GROUP BY u.username

SELECT COUNT( ptometry_number ) AS usecount FROM ( SELECT ptometry_number, company_id, create_time, username, role_id, sale_type, store, sale_number FROM ( SELECT kjyy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, kjyy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_kjyy kjyy JOIN sys_user u ON kjyy.kjyy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON kjyy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT kjjy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, kjjy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_kjjy kjjy JOIN sys_user u ON kjjy.kjjy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON kjjy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT sgjj.ptometry_number, u.company_id, sgjj.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_sgjj sgjj JOIN sys_user u ON sgjj.sgjj_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON sgjj.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT rx.ptometry_number, u.company_id, rx.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_rxjmjcj rx JOIN sys_user u ON rx.rx_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON rx.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT zy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, zy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_zy zy JOIN sys_user u ON zy.zy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON zy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT sjxl.ptometry_number, u.company_id, sjxl.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_sjxl sjxl JOIN sys_user u ON sjxl.sjxl_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON sjxl.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT vst.ptometry_number, u.company_id, vst.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_vst vst JOIN sys_user u ON vst.vst_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON vst.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT crt.ptometry_number, u.company_id, crt.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_crt crt JOIN sys_user u ON crt.crt_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON crt.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT rgp.ptometry_number, u.company_id, rgp.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_rgp rgp JOIN sys_user u ON rgp.rgp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON rgp.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT yp.ptometry_number, u.company_id, yp.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number FROM jc_yaopin yp JOIN sys_user u ON yp.yp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON yp.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number ) aia
and company_id in (#{companyId}) and date_format( create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= (#{settleDateStart}) and date_format( create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <= (#{settleDateEnd}) and store = #{department} and username = #{username} and ( role_id = 7)and ( sale_type=1)
GROUP BY sale_number ) ai

SELECT ifnull( sum( amount_money ), 0 ) AS amountMoney FROM ( SELECT ptometry_number, company_id, create_time, username, role_id, sale_type, store, sale_number, amount_money FROM ( SELECT kjyy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, kjyy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, s.amount_money FROM jc_kjyy kjyy JOIN sys_user u ON kjyy.kjyy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON kjyy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT kjjy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, kjjy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, s.amount_money FROM jc_kjjy kjjy JOIN sys_user u ON kjjy.kjjy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON sgjj.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT rx.ptometry_number, u.company_id, rx.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, s.amount_money FROM jc_rxjmjcj rx JOIN sys_user u ON rx.rx_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON rx.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT zy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, zy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, s.amount_money FROM jc_zy zy JOIN sys_user u ON zy.zy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON zy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT sjxl.ptometry_number, u.company_id, sjxl.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, s.amount_money FROM jc_sjxl sjxl JOIN sys_user u ON sjxl.sjxl_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON sjxl.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT vst.ptometry_number, u.company_id, vst.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, s.amount_money FROM jc_vst vst JOIN sys_user u ON vst.vst_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON vst.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT crt.ptometry_number, u.company_id, crt.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, s.amount_money FROM jc_crt crt JOIN sys_user u ON crt.crt_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON crt.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT rgp.ptometry_number, u.company_id, rgp.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, s.amount_money FROM jc_rgp rgp JOIN sys_user u ON rgp.rgp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON rgp.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT yp.ptometry_number, u.company_id, yp.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, s.amount_money FROM jc_yaopin yp JOIN sys_user u ON yp.yp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON yp.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number ) aia
and company_id in (#{companyId}) and date_format( create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= (#{settleDateStart}) and date_format( create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <= (#{settleDateEnd}) and store = #{department} and username = #{username} and ( role_id = 7)and ( sale_type=1)
GROUP BY sale_number ) ai

SELECT ifnull(sum(s.prime_money),0) AS primeMoney FROM sys_user u JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN jc_tryresults try ON try.optometry_name = u.NAME left join store_sales s on try.ptometry_number=s.ptometry_number
and u.company_id in (#{companyId}) and date_format(try.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= (#{settleDateStart}) and date_format(try.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <= (#{settleDateEnd}) and u.store = #{department} and u.username = #{username} and (ur.role_id = 7)and (s.sale_type=1)

SELECT company_id, store, username, role_id, NAME, sale_number, goods_num, store_name, store_describe, classtype, store_count, store_unit, amount_money, sale_type, create_time FROM ( SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, kjyy.create_time FROM jc_kjyy kjyy JOIN sys_user u ON kjyy.kjyy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON kjyy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, kjjy.create_time FROM jc_kjjy kjjy JOIN sys_user u ON kjjy.kjjy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON kjjy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, sgjj.create_time FROM jc_sgjj sgjj JOIN sys_user u ON sgjj.sgjj_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON sgjj.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, rx.create_time FROM jc_rxjmjcj rx JOIN sys_user u ON rx.rx_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON rx.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, zy.create_time FROM jc_zy zy JOIN sys_user u ON zy.zy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON zy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, sjxl.create_time FROM jc_sjxl sjxl JOIN sys_user u ON sjxl.sjxl_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON sjxl.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, vst.create_time FROM jc_vst vst JOIN sys_user u ON vst.vst_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON vst.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, crt.create_time FROM jc_crt crt JOIN sys_user u ON crt.crt_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON crt.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, rgp.create_time FROM jc_rgp rgp JOIN sys_user u ON rgp.rgp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON rgp.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT u.company_id, u.store, u.username, ur.role_id, u.NAME, s.sale_number, s.goods_num, s.store_name, s.store_describe, s.classtype, s.store_count, s.store_unit, s.amount_money, s.sale_type, yp.create_time FROM jc_yaopin yp JOIN sys_user u ON yp.yp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON yp.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number ) aia
and company_id in (#{companyId}) and date_format( create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= (#{settleDateStart}) and date_format( create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <= (#{settleDateEnd}) and store = #{department} and username = #{username} and store_describe LIKE concat(concat('%', #{storeDescribe}),'%') and store_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{brandname}),'%') and ( role_id = 7) and ( sale_type=1)
GROUP BY sale_number

SELECT ptometry_number, company_id, create_time, username, role_id, sale_type, store, sale_number, doctor FROM ( SELECT kjyy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, kjyy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, kjyy.kjyy_doctor as doctor FROM jc_kjyy kjyy JOIN sys_user u ON kjyy.kjyy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON kjyy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT kjjy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, kjjy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, kjjy.kjjy_doctor as doctor FROM jc_kjjy kjjy JOIN sys_user u ON kjjy.kjjy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON kjjy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT sgjj.ptometry_number, u.company_id, sgjj.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, sgjj.sgjj_doctor as doctor FROM jc_sgjj sgjj JOIN sys_user u ON sgjj.sgjj_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON sgjj.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT rx.ptometry_number, u.company_id, rx.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, rx.rx_doctor as doctor FROM jc_rxjmjcj rx JOIN sys_user u ON rx.rx_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON rx.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT zy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, zy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, zy.zy_doctor as doctor FROM jc_zy zy JOIN sys_user u ON zy.zy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON zy.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT sjxl.ptometry_number, u.company_id, sjxl.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, sjxl.sjxl_doctor as doctor FROM jc_sjxl sjxl JOIN sys_user u ON sjxl.sjxl_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON sjxl.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT vst.ptometry_number, u.company_id, vst.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, vst.vst_doctor as doctor FROM jc_vst vst JOIN sys_user u ON vst.vst_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON vst.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT crt.ptometry_number, u.company_id, crt.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, crt.crt_doctor as doctor FROM jc_crt crt JOIN sys_user u ON crt.crt_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON crt.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT rgp.ptometry_number, u.company_id, rgp.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, rgp.rgp_doctor as doctor FROM jc_rgp rgp JOIN sys_user u ON rgp.rgp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON rgp.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number UNION ALL SELECT yp.ptometry_number, u.company_id, yp.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, s.sale_type, u.store, s.sale_number, yp.yp_doctor as doctor FROM jc_yaopin yp JOIN sys_user u ON yp.yp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN store_sales s ON yp.ptometry_number = s.ptometry_number ) aia
and company_id in (#{companyId}) and date_format( create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) >= (#{settleDateStart}) and date_format( create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) <= (#{settleDateEnd}) and store = #{department} and username = #{username} and store_describe LIKE concat(concat('%', #{storeDescribe}),'%') and store_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{brandname}),'%') and ( role_id = 7) and ( sale_type=1)
GROUP BY sale_number

SELECT ptometry_number, company_id, create_time, username, role_id, store, doctor FROM ( SELECT kjyy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, kjyy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, kjyy.kjyy_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_kjyy kjyy JOIN sys_user u ON kjyy.kjyy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id UNION ALL SELECT kjjy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, kjjy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, kjjy.kjjy_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_kjjy kjjy JOIN sys_user u ON kjjy.kjjy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id UNION ALL SELECT sgjj.ptometry_number, u.company_id, sgjj.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, sgjj.sgjj_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_sgjj sgjj JOIN sys_user u ON sgjj.sgjj_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id UNION ALL SELECT rx.ptometry_number, u.company_id, rx.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, rx.rx_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_rxjmjcj rx JOIN sys_user u ON rx.rx_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id UNION ALL SELECT zy.ptometry_number, u.company_id, zy.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, zy.zy_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_zy zy JOIN sys_user u ON zy.zy_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id UNION ALL SELECT sjxl.ptometry_number, u.company_id, sjxl.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, sjxl.sjxl_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_sjxl sjxl JOIN sys_user u ON sjxl.sjxl_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id UNION ALL SELECT vst.ptometry_number, u.company_id, vst.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, vst.vst_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_vst vst JOIN sys_user u ON vst.vst_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id UNION ALL SELECT crt.ptometry_number, u.company_id, crt.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, crt.crt_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_crt crt JOIN sys_user u ON crt.crt_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id UNION ALL SELECT rgp.ptometry_number, u.company_id, rgp.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, rgp.rgp_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_rgp rgp JOIN sys_user u ON rgp.rgp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id UNION ALL SELECT yp.ptometry_number, u.company_id, yp.create_time, u.username, ur.role_id, u.store, yp.yp_doctor AS doctor FROM jc_yaopin yp JOIN sys_user u ON yp.yp_optometry_name = u. NAME JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id ) aia
